posts.postText:
I've got a job for the summer working on a construction crew :D!
Gonna be gone for awhile, or not. It really depends, but I might be
on and off waiting for more work (Painting, roofing, block, etc)

Side-Note: Apparently we also have to move out of the place we're living at
because my cousin's a drug addict/drunk and his Dad can't accept that
Good luck with construction and getting out of your bed after the first day.
